# What are some of the major concepts associated with agenda setting?

.footnote[From the _Birkland_ chapter]

???
agenda: The list of things being discussed and sometimes acted upon by an institution, the news media, or the public at large

agenda-setting: The process by which problems and alternative solutions gain or lose public and elite attention 

agenda universe - systemic - institutional - decision 

power (positive and negative)

conditions and problems 

indicators - focusing events

symbols and stories

causal stories
